name: Theurgist
description: SpiritWalkers who have formed deep bonds with benevolent spirits and divine entities, channeling their power to heal, protect, and banish evil while serving as beacons of spiritual light.

resource_systems.name: Mana
resource_systems.description: Mystical energy that powers spells and spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: 5 per 6 seconds, +8 when near natural elements, spirit anchors, or holy sites
mechanics: Mana points are spent to cast spells and invoke spiritual powers
Some abilities require maintaining focus, consuming mana over time
Communing with benevolent spirits increases mana regeneration rate by 500%
Depleted mana causes penalties to spell effectiveness and spirit connection
Can channel mana into divine totems, spirit vessels, and healing circles for persistent effects
Healing abilities restore a portion of spent mana when used on allies in critical condition

resource_systems.name: Spirit Attunement
resource_systems.description: Connection to the spirit world that enhances spiritual abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when communing with benevolent spirits, decreases when spirits are angered
mechanics: Increases by 20 when performing rituals honoring benevolent spirits
Increases by 15 per minute when in spiritually significant or holy locations
Decreases by 20 when spirits are disrespected or dismissed
Decreases by 15 per minute when in spiritually corrupted or unholy areas
Can be spent to enhance spiritual abilities or summon powerful benevolent spirit allies
Higher Spirit Attunement increases the potency of healing and protective abilities

resource_systems.name: Planar Resonance
resource_systems.description: Harmony with the different planes of existence that allows for dimensional manipulation
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when traversing between planes or communing with benevolent extraplanar entities
mechanics: Increases by 15 when successfully traversing between planes
Increases by 10 when maintaining balance between different spiritual forces
Decreases by 15 when causing planar disruptions or imbalances
Decreases by 10 when remaining in a single plane for extended periods
Can be spent to open temporary portals to beneficial planes or banish malevolent entities
Higher Planar Resonance strengthens connections to divine and benevolent realms

resource_systems.name: Divine Favor
resource_systems.description: Blessing from divine entities that empowers healing and protective abilities
resource_systems.regeneration: Builds when performing acts of compassion, healing, or protection
mechanics: Increases by 15 when healing critically injured allies
Increases by 20 when protecting innocents from harm
Decreases by 10 when refusing to aid those in need
Decreases by 15 when causing unnecessary harm or suffering
Can be spent to enhance healing abilities or create powerful divine protections
At maximum Divine Favor, enter a state of divine communion that greatly enhances all abilities

class_mechanics.name: Divine Communion
class_mechanics.description: Direct connection to divine entities and benevolent spirits
effects: Can channel divine energy for powerful healing and protective effects
Able to request divine intervention in times of great need
Divine entities may provide guidance and information voluntarily
Presence soothes suffering and provides comfort to the distressed
Can perceive divine purpose and spiritual corruption with perfect clarity

class_mechanics.name: Spirit Healing
class_mechanics.description: Advanced healing abilities that mend both physical and spiritual wounds
effects: Healing abilities affect both physical injuries and spiritual ailments
Can cure curses, possession, and other spiritual afflictions
Able to restore life force drained by undead or negative energy
Healing creates a temporary spiritual shield around the target
Presence accelerates natural healing in allies and nearby creatures

class_mechanics.name: Banishment
class_mechanics.description: Ability to forcibly return spirits and extraplanar entities to their native planes
effects: Can banish malevolent spirits and demons back to their home planes
Able to close unauthorized portals between planes
Banished entities cannot return for a significant period
Can create wards that prevent specific types of entities from entering an area
Presence weakens the connection of malevolent entities to the material plane

class_mechanics.name: Spiritual Radiance
class_mechanics.description: Emanation of spiritual light that purifies and protects
effects: Continuous aura of spiritual light that damages undead and evil spirits
Can intensify radiance to create blinding flashes that repel darkness
Spiritual light purifies corrupted areas and objects over time
Allies within the radiance gain resistance to negative energy and fear
Presence reveals hidden spiritual corruption and malevolent entities

signature_abilities.name: Divine Intervention
signature_abilities.description: Call upon divine powers for a miraculous intervention in dire circumstances
mechanics: Request direct intervention from divine entities to address a critical situation
Effect varies based on the situation but is always powerfully beneficial
Can heal all allies to full health, banish all enemies, or create impenetrable protection
Divine entities may add unexpected beneficial effects based on their nature
Success is guaranteed but specific outcome is determined by the divine entities involved
Costs 100 Mana, 50 Spirit Attunement, and 75 Divine Favor

signature_abilities.name: Circle of Restoration
signature_abilities.description: Create a sacred circle that continuously heals and purifies
mechanics: Establish a 30-meter radius circle that lasts for 10 minutes
Allies within the circle heal 10% of their maximum health per minute
Circle continuously cleanses curses, poisons, and negative effects
Undead and malevolent spirits cannot enter the circle
The environment within the circle is temporarily purified of corruption
Costs 75 Mana, 30 Spirit Attunement, and 50 Divine Favor

signature_abilities.name: Spiritual Ascension
signature_abilities.description: Temporarily ascend to a higher spiritual state with greatly enhanced abilities
mechanics: For 5 minutes, transform into a radiant spiritual entity
All healing and protective abilities are twice as effective
Gain the ability to fly and pass through solid objects
Attacks deal additional divine damage that bypasses resistances
Continuously emanate an aura that heals allies and damages undead
Costs 50 Mana, 100 Spirit Attunement, and 25 Planar Resonance

skill_trees.name: Path of Mercy
key_abilities: Mass Healing: Heal all allies within 30 meters simultaneously
Resurrection: Return the recently deceased to life with no penalties
Purification: Remove all negative effects, curses, and corruptions from a target

skill_trees.name: Path of Protection
key_abilities: Divine Shield: Create an impenetrable barrier around an ally that absorbs all damage
Sanctuary: Establish an area where violence is impossible
Spirit Guardians: Summon protective spirits that intercept attacks meant for allies

skill_trees.name: Path of Exorcism
skill_trees.focus: Banishing evil and undoing spiritual corruption
key_abilities: Mass Banishment: Force all extraplanar entities in an area to return to their home planes
Consecration: Permanently purify an area, making it inhospitable to evil
Soul Anchor: Prevent spirits from being forcibly removed from their bodies

advancement_requirements.skill_points: At least 15 points in the Spirit Binder skill tree
advancement_requirements.alignment: Must maintain Good alignment for at least 10 levels
challenges: Successfully heal a spiritually corrupted individual

legendary_items.name: Staff of Divine Light
effects: Wisdom increased by 5
Healing spells are 30% more effective
Can store divine energy to cast healing spells without using mana

legendary_items.name: Amulet of the Divine Pact
effects: Divine Favor regeneration increased by 100%
Divine Intervention cooldown reduced by 2 days
Once per day, automatically resurrect upon death with 50% health

legendary_items.name: Robes of the Spiritual Ascendant
effects: Spirit Attunement maximum increased by 50
Continuously emanate a healing aura that restores 1% health per minute to nearby allies
Spiritual Ascension duration increased by 3 minutes

lore: Theurgists represent the pinnacle of spiritual healing and divine communion among SpiritWalkers, having formed profound connections with benevolent spirits and divine entities. These compassionate healers have transcended the ordinary boundaries between mortal and divine, becoming living conduits for celestial power and spiritual light. The path to becoming a Theurgist requires not only exceptional spiritual sensitivity but also unwavering compassion and a genuine desire to alleviate suffering. Those who succeed find themselves blessed with unprecedented healing abilities that can mend both physical wounds and spiritual ailments that conventional medicine or magic cannot touch. Theurgists often serve as spiritual leaders in their communities, guiding others in proper reverence for benevolent spirits and divine entities while protecting them from malevolent influences. Many establish sanctuaries where the spiritually wounded can find healing and peace, while others travel to areas of spiritual corruption to cleanse and restore balance. Their ability to banish malevolent entities and close unauthorized portals between planes makes them particularly effective against demonic incursions and undead threats. Though they possess tremendous power, Theurgists use their abilities with humility and wisdom, understanding that they serve as vessels for divine will rather than wielders of power in their own right. Their presence alone can bring comfort to the suffering and strike fear into creatures of darkness, making them beacons of hope in troubled times.
